original_text: But I received mercy for this reason, that in me, as the foremost, Jesus Christ might display his perfect patience as an example to those who were to believe in him for eternal life.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 긍휼을 입은 까닭은 예수 그리스도께서 내게 먼저 일체 오래 참으심을 보이사 후에 주를 믿어 영생 얻는 자들에게 본이 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: But I received mercy for this reason,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 긍휼을 얻은 것은 이 때문입니다,

sentences.original_text: that in me, as the foremost,
Jesus Christ might display his perfect patience
sentences.korean_translation: 예수 그리스도께서 그의 온전하신 오래 참으심을 보이려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: to those who were to believe in him
